item.description:
Are you hip to Social Media and Web 2.0? Are you using Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn to update people on your cat’s latest antics, or are you using them to attract Buyers and Sellers?

On Thursday, April 2nd at Turning the Key, your monthly Networking and Education event for local real estate investors, professionals, entrepreneurs and marketers, New England local and Social Media expert Dianna Huff will be sharing her tips and tricks for getting the most out of Social Media and Web 2.0.

The world is changing and no where is this more evident than in the online space. Newspapers are dying. Magazines are dying. People are deleting commercials through TiVo. So how do you reach them?

You must hang out where your prospects hang out - and that's online, where everyone is connected 24/7.

In this lively and interactive presentation, New England local social media expert Dianna Huff will explain how to incorporate social media / networking into your business.

You will learn:
  • Why social media really is for business - and why you simply can't ignore it.
  • Which tools you should be using and how to measure ROI.
  • How to use LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter to develop your "online" brand and to network.
  • How to showcase your expertise - and your properties! -- via a blog and YouTube.
  • The top social media Dos and Don'ts!



Dianna has a tremendous amount to share with us. Come on out to Dedham on Thursday night to Turning the Key, join us for an evening of education and networking, and listen in as Dianna uncovers the top tips to attracting buyers and sellers using Social Media + Web 2.0!

Seating is Limited and pre-registration is HIGHLY recommended!

$45 at the Door (no exceptions) • $15 for Pre-Registrations • $10 for Pre-Registered Members • FREE for TTK Pass Holders. Pre-Register Online <-- Here

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: TTK: Attracting Buyers and Sellers Using Social Media + Web 2.0
